Summary: UFO sighted with binoculars over the Elk River (Nuclear) Power Plant.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Elk River
There were no other sightings in Elk River on or around July 5th 1967
divs: Sighting DetailsMy older brother (Edward E.) and his friend (Steven W.) were driving back from our cabin in northern Minnesota via Elk River when my brother (riding as the passenger in the front seat) sighted a strange object over the Elk River Power Plant (NOTE: this power plant was nuclear in the 60's, but no longer is) and actually asked the driver to stop so he could get a better look. After stopping and getting out of the vehicle they both took turns viewing the disc-shaped object which had lights on it and did not appear to be moving. After a short time of viewing the UFO left the area at an extremely high rate of speed (unlike anything man-made). In just a few moments the reason for the departure of the UFO was very evident - fighter jets had been deployed and came streaking across the sky, but they were "too late" to intercept. My brother still has clear recolection of this sighting and I do not think that he has previously reported it. Edward servied honorably in Navy Intelligence and I respect his story. David E. CPA
